front.title: •Sergeant Barich
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (or 3 to any speeder bike). When in a battle with your other biker scout, may draw one battle destiny and subtract that amount from opponent's attrition and total power.
front.lore: Wakeelmui native. Former employee of Sienar Fleet Systems missile division. Stormtrooper biker scout with dreams of transferring to 181st Imperial Fighter Group.

rulings: Barich's action only works if attrition exists.
Barich's action is played in the power segment after attrition destinies are drawn.
